Introduction We were assigned to design, develop and implement a real world-based project using the mbed NUCLEO-F411RE and/or ESP32C3-based development board(s) and some or all of the following components: the onboard green (LD2) and external LED(s), keypad, LCD/OLED, buzzer, switch(es), sensor(s), and the internet access using an external ESP 8266 WiFi module/internal built-in WiFi block of the ESP32 chip. We were given a green card to choose any title and theme that appeals to us.
